entry.title: Try to use hexo new post way to create a new blog
entry.content:
I am trying a new way to create a blog

This way I use code “hexo new post xxxxx” to create a new .md file
Today I try too mach ways to make my blog more useful
I am so tired
I think I should sleep early to have a good dream
But I sleep too early
And now I got up !
oh ,how can I speend my beautiful night!
so I’ll do my blog after this blog
next I’ll try how to use markdown to edit my words.
Ok see you next blog!
